name: hay-v3
description: Hay platform - Unified monorepo for dashboard, server, and plugins
author: Hay Labs

scripts.dev: npm run dev:server & npm run dev:dashboard
scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:dashboard
scripts.start: npm run start:server & npm run start:dashboard
scripts.test: npm run test:dashboard && npm run test:server
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:dashboard && npm run typecheck:server
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dashboard && npm run clean:server
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules dashboard/node_modules server/node_modules plugins/*/node_modules
scripts.kill-ports: npm run kill-ports:dashboard & npm run kill-ports:server
scripts.kill-ports:dashboard: fuser -k 3000/tcp 2>/dev/null || lsof -ti tcp:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
